    • Resources
    • Wela'lieg

My [body parts] hurt. (inanimate)

 

Here's some more practice describing body pains.

Vocabulary Section 1
 

Gesnuguigl 'ns'tuaqann.

My ears hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl 'npugugl.

My eyes hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl 'nsi'l.

My lips hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl nipitl.

My teeth hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl 'ntlmaqann.

My shoulders hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl npitnoqoml.

My arms hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl npitnn.

My hands hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl ntijinn.

My thumbs hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl 'ngatl.

My legs/feet hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl nulugunn.

My thighs hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguig 'ngajignn.

My lower legs hurt.

 
 

Gesnuguigl nligsi'l.

My guts hurt.
